snippet: A video showing a mass assault on a woman during a Tahrir Square celebration has stirred new outrage among rape victims and women’s rights advocates.
abstract: Video showing mass assault on a woman during Tahrir Square celebration in Egypt stirs new outrage among rape victims and women’s rights advocates, who demand that newly elected Pres Abdel Fattah el-Sisi respond to plague of sexual assaults in the country.

byline.contributor: May Kamel and Mayy El Sheikh contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: A video showing a mass assault on a woman during a Tahrir Square celebration has stirred new outrage among rape victims and women’s rights advocates.

headline.main: Egypt’s Inaction on Sexual Attacks Stirs Fury
headline.print_headline: Egypt’s Inaction on Sex Attacks Stirs Fury

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
keywords.name: subject
